document.full_text: securities lawyers say rules surrounding insider trading are murky, making it difficult to predict whether david l. sokol, a former deputy to warren e. buffett, could face legal liability.
document.title: s.e.c. said to weigh inquiry of sokol's lubrizol trades
lines_and_colors: securities lawyers say rules surrounding insider trading are murky, making it difficult to predict whether david l. sokol, a former deputy to warren e. buffett, could face legal liability.
